title: Cutthroat

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Visit a player and find out what subalignment they are. If they are a good protective role, attack them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the end of each night, you will learn how many protective roles are still alive.
- At least one good protective role must be in the game for this to roll.
- Protective roles will know that a Cutthroat is in the game.
- After eliminating all protective roles, the Mafia can make up to two factional kills per night (two members make two kills).

desc:
Post 414
*Defence is for losers. For weaklings, who should never have been able to survive.*
